Title: Patintero: Ang alamat ni Meng Patalo
Actors: Nafa Hilario-Cruz, Lenlen Frial, William Buenavente, Claude Mikael Adrales
Plot: On the streets of Barangay San Jose, one game rules the streets - Patintero. Meng Francisco is the neighborhood 'patalo', a loser who hasn't won a single game. With the Linggo ng Wika ...
